p: The gene expression results obtained from the high‐throughput sequencing were validated by quantitative reverse transcription‐PCR (qRT‐PCR) analysis. A total of 12 randomly selected key candidate genes from each of four different treatment groups were used for validation. As anticipated, the qRT‐PCR results for the different groups (Figure 11) were consistent with the sequencing data. The primer sequences used in this study are listed in Table S5.
